title: 07/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, basketball Hall of Fame member Charles Barkley tells us which future NFL QB he thinks he could beat at golf today. Also, Turner Sports NBA analyst Channing Frye explains how he would fix Ben Simmons' jump shot. Plus, actor from "The Wire" and "Bosch," Jamie Hector discusses his role on both shows. Finally, Phoenix Suns center Frank Kaminsky explains why he didn't retaliate against Clipper Patrick Beverly after Beverly shoved Chris Paul.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, basketball Hall of Fame member Charles Barkley tells us which future NFL QB he thinks he could beat at golf today. Also, Turner Sports NBA analyst Channing Frye explains how he would fix Ben Simmons' jump shot. Plus, actor from "The Wire" and "Bosch," Jamie Hector discusses his role on both shows. Finally, Phoenix Suns center Frank Kaminsky explains why he didn't retaliate against Clipper Patrick Beverly after Beverly shoved Chris Paul.
